page.title: 11Interesting People
page.content: MRS.YARDY Mrs.Yardy was born in Folksworth in 1930.She has one child who does not live with her any more.She said that many of her relations have died in Folksworth and have been buried in the church.She has one pet a poodle.Her poodle is four years old.Mrs.Yardy's first name is Kathleen.She would not like to see any changes in Folksworth.She said that the school has changed alot.She has worked in the school for thirty-eight years.The changes that have been made since she has been at the school are that the small classroom was made into an office.The open fire was taken away. The old wash basins and bucket toilets were taken away and the old cobble stones were removed. Mrs.Yardy enjoys working at the school.
